title.text: RFC 6924: Registration of Second-Level URN Namespaces under "ietf"

contents.text:
Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF)                          B. Leiba
Request for Comments: 6924                           Huawei Technologies
Updates: 2648                                                 April 2013
Category: Informational
ISSN: 2070-1721
Registration of Second-Level URN Namespaces under "ietf"
contents.zh-CHS: 在“ietf”下注册二级URN命名空间

contents.text: Abstract
contents.zh-CHS: 摘要

contents.text: RFC 2648 defines the "ietf" URN namespace and a number of sub-namespaces. RFC 3553 defines an additional sub-namespace, "params", and creates a registry to document allocations under that. But there is no registry that lists, in one place, all sub-namespaces of "ietf". This document creates and populates such a registry, thereby changing the mechanism defined in RFC 2648 for adding new sub-namespaces of "ietf".
contents.zh-CHS: RFC 2648定义了“ietf”URN命名空间和许多子命名空间。RFC3553定义了一个附加的子名称空间“params”，并创建一个注册表来记录该名称空间下的分配。但没有一个注册表在一个地方列出“ietf”的所有子名称空间。本文档创建并填充此类注册表，从而更改RFC 2648中定义的用于添加“ietf”新子命名空间的机制。

contents.text: Status of This Memo
contents.zh-CHS: 关于下段备忘

contents.text: This document is not an Internet Standards Track specification; it is published for informational purposes.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件不是互联网标准跟踪规范；它是为了提供信息而发布的。

It has received public review and has been approved for publication by the Internet Engineering Steering Group (IESG). Not all documents approved by the IESG are a candidate for any level of Internet Standard; see Section 2 of RFC 5741.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件是互联网工程任务组（IETF）的产品。它代表了IETF社区的共识。它已经接受了公众审查，并已被互联网工程指导小组（IESG）批准出版。并非IESG批准的所有文件都适用于任何级别的互联网标准；见RFC 5741第2节。

contents.zh-CHS: 有关本文件当前状态、任何勘误表以及如何提供反馈的信息，请访问http://www.rfc-editor.org/info/rfc6924.

contents.text: 1. Introduction
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 介绍

contents.text: "A URN Namespace for IETF Documents" [RFC2648] defines the "ietf" URN namespace and a number of sub-namespaces. "An IETF URN Sub-namespace for Registered Protocol Parameters" [RFC3553] defines an additional sub-namespace, "params", and creates a registry to document allocations under that. But there is no registry that lists, in one place, all sub-namespaces of "ietf". This document creates and populates such a registry, thereby changing the mechanism defined in RFC 2648 for adding new sub-namespaces of "ietf".
contents.zh-CHS: “IETF文档的URN名称空间”[RFC2648]定义了“IETF”URN名称空间和许多子名称空间。“注册协议参数的IETF URN子命名空间”[RFC3553]定义了一个附加子命名空间“params”，并创建一个注册表来记录该子命名空间下的分配。但没有一个注册表在一个地方列出“ietf”的所有子名称空间。本文档创建并填充此类注册表，从而更改RFC 2648中定义的用于添加“ietf”新子命名空间的机制。

contents.text: 2. IANA Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 2. IANA考虑

contents.text: There is currently a top-level registry group called "IETF Protocol Parameter Identifiers", which contains one registry, "IETF URN Sub-namespace for Registered Protocol Parameters". IANA has taken the following three actions:
contents.zh-CHS: 目前有一个名为“IETF协议参数标识符”的顶级注册表组，其中包含一个注册表“注册协议参数的IETF URN子命名空间”。IANA已采取以下三项行动：

contents.text: Action 1: Renamed the group "IETF Protocol Parameter Identifiers", giving it the new name "Uniform Resource Name (URN) Namespace for IETF Use". The existing registry in that group remains, and its name is unchanged. Its registration procedure has been updated to "IETF Review" (formerly called "IETF Consensus").
contents.zh-CHS: 措施1：将组重命名为“IETF协议参数标识符”，将其命名为“IETF使用的统一资源名称（URN）命名空间”。该组中的现有注册表保持不变，其名称不变。其注册程序已更新为“IETF审查”（以前称为“IETF共识”）。

contents.text: Action 2: Added a new registry to the renamed group. The new registry is called "IETF URN Sub-namespaces", and new registrations will use the IETF Review policy [RFC5226], which provides for IETF consensus in order to add a new URN namespace under "ietf". The new registry appears first in the group, to provide a human-friendly, top-down resolution of the namespace hierarchy.
contents.zh-CHS: 操作2：将新注册表添加到重命名的组。新注册称为“IETF URN子名称空间”，新注册将使用IETF审查政策[RFC5226]，该政策规定了IETF共识，以便在“IETF”下添加新的URN名称空间。新的注册表首先出现在组中，以提供一种人性化的、自上而下的名称空间层次结构解析。

contents.text: Action 3: Populated the new registry as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 操作3：按如下方式填充新注册表：

contents.text: IETF URN Sub-namespaces
contents.zh-CHS: IETF URN子名称空间

contents.text: Registration Procedures: IETF Review Reference: [RFC6924]
contents.zh-CHS: 注册程序：IETF审查参考：[RFC6924]

contents.text: Note: This is the Official Registry for sub-namespaces of the 'IETF' URN Namespace.
contents.zh-CHS: 注意：这是“IETF”URN命名空间子命名空间的官方注册。

contents.text:
Sub-namespace | Reference | IANA Registry Reference
--------------+-----------+-----------------------------------------
rfc           | [RFC2648] | none
fyi           | [RFC2648] | none
std           | [RFC2648] | none
bcp           | [RFC2648] | none
id            | [RFC2648] | none
mtg           | [RFC2648] | none
params        | [RFC3553] | [http://www.iana.org/assignments/params]
--------------+-----------+-----------------------------------------
3. Security Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 安全考虑

contents.text: This is a procedural document and is entirely unrelated to security.
contents.zh-CHS: 这是一份程序性文件，与安全完全无关。

contents.text: 4. Acknowledgments
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 致谢

contents.text: Alfred Hoenes noticed the absence of this registry and suggested its creation.
contents.zh-CHS: 阿尔弗雷德·霍恩斯（Alfred Hoenes）注意到该登记册的缺失，并建议创建该登记册。

contents.zh-CHS: 5. 工具书类

contents.zh-CHS: 5.2. 资料性引用
